title: Looking for Mid or Adc (Iron to Gold)
body:
We have players wanting to play flex and enter tournaments just looking for that last player.

We are iron to gold, mainly all high silver - low gold.

Looking for someone chill and looking to climb and become better as a team.

Add me on league if you are interested.
TKG Hal

Thanks

replies.body:
Don't know if I fit the criteria but I'm currently plat 4 in solo/duo and I pref playing bot lane... But my ranked flex is currently down in the dumps so you can add me if you want. 
IGN: Bby Rengo.
